title: Location: Prepositions (Usefulness 4)
description: Traveler usefulness 4/10 phrases for the Prepositions subcategory within Location. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: The books are under the desk.
cards.romaji: Hon wa tsukue no shita ni aru.

cards.english: There is a ball under the car.
cards.romaji: Kuruma no shita ni boru ga arimasu.
cards.japanese: 車の下にボールがあります。
